name: Formula Racing Rival Simulator
description:
Formula Racing Rivals Simulator game gets driving all the cars and wins at every track and become the king of the track. racing game feel as if you are in a real car through a 3D representation. Racing when I was younger I loved to watch all the time on television, where programs found me racing. Real racing since I was little I liked these races, formula racing game the cars and the sport. The whole time I wanted to participate and in a race like this, but I have the time, I had the car ready to make racing and I had the experience to drive such a car. In this game you have the opportunity that I have not had it, i.e. you can climb into a race car fast and move with great speed on the highway near the city. Formula Racing Rivals Simulator game. The ultimate endless race in the city streets, countryside roads and seashores, featuring amazing vehicles, addictive game play and intense traffic competition. Barrel through packed streets, avoid crashes, take down traffic cars, pick up coins and perform dynamic, high-speed aerial stunts. car race will challenge even the most skilled racing fans. This amazingly realistic Car Racing game is fully packed with super-fast cars and dynamic racing levels. Get ready to drive high performance cars (turbo or naturally aspirated) and make them drift at high speed in tracks designed specifically for drift racing.
Formula Racing Rivals Simulator games improve your racing and drifting skills and earn virtual money to tune and customize your car. Race to battle the world record of the leader board or just for fun in the ride mode. A race car game that goes as fast as you want it to! We offer the only formula race car as live wallpaper on your smart phone. No other application even comes close. We have taken the best turbo race cars and tracks from all over the world and created our own spin on the ultimate thrill car race of your life. You will feel as if you are in the first row and your hands are holding on for dear life.
Features:
• 3D Environment
• Realistic car simulation
• Smooth controls
• Different formula car racing
• Riders sound
